law.text: At the beginning of each regular session of the General Assembly, each house shall elect one (1) chief clerk, one (1) assistant clerk, one (1) enrolling clerk, one (1) sergeant-at-arms, one (1) doorkeeper and one (1) janitor; the Senate shall elect one (1) cloakroom keeper and three (3) pages and the House of Representatives shall elect two (2) cloakroom keepers and four (4) pages.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1988.
